text: Baidu network disk privacy policy
Updated in this version: February 2, 2021
You are welcome to use Baidu web disk service!

Beijing Duyou Technology Co., Ltd. cherishes your trust to us when providing your personal information. We will process your personal information and ensure your information security in accordance with this privacy policy.
introduction
Baidu network disk is an online information storage platform providing data storage, synchronization, management and sharing to the majority of users.

To provide you with the above services, we will collect your necessary personal information. This privacy policy aims to help you understand the type of our personal information and how we use and protect your personal information. At the same time, we also introduce usFor privacy control functions, you can use these functions to control your personal information.
Baidu network disk will not collect content data you store and share on the network disk, providing storage space for these content data only.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Baidu network disk will not collect content data you store and share on the network disk, providing storage space for these content data only.

text: The personal information referred to in this privacy policy does not include the content data when you use network disk storage and sharing services.
label: Important
rewrite: The personal information referred to in this privacy policy does not include the content data when you use network disk storage and sharing services.

text: This privacy policy is applicable to the Baidu network disk software development tool package (SDK) and application programming interface (API), applets, etc.Access and use our products and services.
Please read this privacy policy carefully, and then use the Baidu network disk service after confirming and agreeing.
This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How can we entrust the processing, sharing, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information and the third parties that the access to
4. How do we save and protect your personal information
5. Your rights
6. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
7. How can your personal information be transferred globally
8. Revision of privacy policy
9. How to contact us
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
Personal information refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information with other information or other information.
According to the principles of legal, legitimate, and necessary, we only collect information necessary for the implementation of product functions.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: According to the principles of legal, correctness, and necessary, only the necessary information of the product function is collected.

text: (1) You directly provide personal information with our automatic collection
1. Baidu network disk business function
Baidu network disk business functions are divided into core business functions, additional business functions and services provided by third parties:
1) The core function of Baidu network disk is to realize the necessary functions of cloud storage and sharing, including file uploading, backup, management, downloading, and sharing.

2) In addition, Baidu network disk also provides you with additional business functions, including intelligent classification, photo stories, picture retrieval based on storage photos, etc., to provide you with content malls for display, purchase and consumer services.Smart hardware device services provided you with data storage, data transmission, and data online for the hardware devices installed with smart operating systems.

3) Baidu's network disk also connects to a rich third -party service, including the new and editing of the documents that users can use the services provided by the third party, use third -party services to beauty and beautify the pictures, and achieve photos cloud through third -party services through third -party services.Printing, etc., as well as third -party account login, sharing, message push and payment services connected by software development tool packs (SDK) forms.
Third -party services will continue to be enriched to enrich your experience.
You do not use third -party services will not affect your use of other business functions of Baidu's network disk.
Please note that the processing of third -party service providers will apply for the privacy policy of the third -party service.
2. The personal information of various functions of Baidu network disk needs to be collected and used
(1) Personal information involved in registering, logging in to Baidu network disk and related services
1) Baidu account registration information
You use Baidu web disk for file storage and sharing. You need to register and log in to Baidu Web Disk account.
When registering Baidu's web disk account, you need to provide us with a mobile phone number at least;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: You can also provide avatars, account names, mailboxes, creating account passwords, and secret information information to enrich your account information, protect your account security, and facilitate you to find your account.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect avatar, account name, mailbox, creating account password, and secret information information to protect account security.

text: 2) Third -party account login information
You can log in to Baidu web disk using third -party accounts (such as WeChat, Weibo, QQ).
At this time, you will authorize Baidu's online disk to read the public information (nickname, avatar, etc.) registered on the third -party account.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Authorized Baidu Web Disk Read the public information (nickname, avatar, etc.) registered in the third -party account.

text: The processing of your personal information will apply to the privacy policy of the third party.
3) Participate in the contact information information of operation activities

If you participate in related operating activities, we will collect but not be limited to your identity information, contact information, trading account information (specifically operating activities with operational activities (specifically operating activities (specifically operating activitiesThe needs are subject to) to get in touch with you, issue operational rewards to you.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your identity information, contact information, and transaction account information (specifically the needs of operating activities) in order to get in touch with you.

text: If you do not participate in related operating activities, you do not need to provide the aforementioned information.

First Party Collection Information

text: (2) Personal information involved in various business functions of Baidu network disk
1) Equipment and log information

Like most Internet services, our server will automatically record the requests you issued when visiting Baidu's network disk, such as the search keyword you entered, the playback duration of the audio/video playback function, the file size, the size of the file, the size of the file, the sizefile type.

The automatic backup function only needs to be realized in the case of mobile phone connection and login Baidu network disk. This function requires you to choose whether to open it by yourself, and the network conditions and file types that you choose to set up automatic backup.

text: (5) Provide you with intelligent services
In order to help you better find and manage pictures, Baidu's network disk relying on AI technology to classify the face, place and information information in your picture.
You can also add labels (such as mothers, younger brothers, Xiaoming, etc.) to the face of your album, so that you can quickly find the pictures you need (such as input: Beijing, Sky, Brother, etc.).

text: 2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
To ensure the normal operation of the website, we will store the small data files, cookies, and small data files on your computer or mobile device.

First Party Collection Information

text: Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.
The main features of Cookie are convenient for you to use website products and services, as well as helping websites to count the number of independent visitors.
Using cookie technology, we can provide you with more thoughtful user experience services and allow you to set your specific service options.
When you use the Baidu network disk products and services, you will send cookies to your device.

First Party Collection Information

q=cookie ；

5. We also ask you to understand that due to the technical restrictions and rapid development of the Internet industry, and various malicious attack methods that may exist, even if we can do our best to strengthen security measures, it is impossible to ensure 100 % security of information.
Please understand that the system and communication network you used when using our products and/or services may have security problems in other links other than our control.

6. According to our security management system, personal information leakage, damage or loss is listed as the most major security incident. Once it occurs, the company's highest -level emergency plan will be started.Multiple departments form a joint emergency response group treatment.

Attachment: term explanation

1. Personal information refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information to identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural person activities alone or with other information.

Personal information includes names, date of birth, ID number, personal biometric information, address, communication and communication contact information, communication records and content, account password, property information, credit information, travel information, accommodation information, health and physiological information, transactions, transactions, transactionsInformation, etc.

2. Personal sensitive information refers to personal information that once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people and property, which can easily lead to personal information that causes personal reputation, physical and mental health, or discriminatory treatment.

Personal sensitive information includes identity documents, personal biometric information, bank accounts, communication records and content, property information, credit information, travel information, accommodation information, health and physiological information, transaction information, under 14 years of age (inclusive) minorPersonal information, etc.
3. Devices refer to devices that can be used to use Baidu products and/or services, such as desktop devices, tablets or smartphones.

4. The unique device identifier refers to a device identifier with uniqueness (sometimes called universal ID or UUID).(For example, international mobile device identity code IMEI number, network device hardware address MAC).
Different device identifiers will vary in the validity period, whether the user can reset, and the acquisition method.
The corresponding equipment may have multiple different device identifiers.

The only device identifier can be used for a variety of uses, including security and fraud detection, synchronous services (such as user email boxes), recording user preference settings, and providing correlation advertisements.

5.Cookie refers to a mechanism that supports the server (or script) to store and retrieve information on the client. By adding simple and persistent client status to expand the web client/server application.
The server sends a status information while returning the HTTP object to the client, and is stored by the client.
The state information shows the effective URL range in this state.
Since then, the HTTP request within this range initiated by the client will return the current value of the status information from the client to the server. This state information is called Cookie.

6. Anonymous labeling means that based on the equipment parameters, and by machine algorithm, Duyou produces a labeling symbol such as BaidUID and CUID to help Duyou company identify a user and provide it with better products and/or services and improve user experience.Essence
7. Anonymous refers to the process that the personal information subject cannot be recognized by the technical processing of personal information, and the processing information cannot be restored.
The information obtained by personal information after anonymous processing does not belong to personal information.

8. Related companies refer to the list or collective name of the company's operator Beijing Duyou Technology Co., Ltd. ("Duyou Company") and other companies that have a relationship with Duyou Company.

"Related relationship" refers to the subject (including individuals, companies, partnerships, organizations, or other entities), that is, the subject that directly or indirectly controls, or the subject that controls it directly or indirectlyMaster controlled by the same subject.

The aforementioned "control" means that through holding voting rights, contracts or other methods, directly or indirectly have the power or other relationships that instructions or instructions that to instructions to make instructions by others.
Thank you again for your trust and use of Baidu web disk!
Beijing Duyou Technology Co., Ltd.
<the-end-of-privacy-policy>
